title: Gus Hollomon
text:
Gus Martin Hollomon (born October 23, 1945) is a former professional <a href="American%20football">American football</a> <a href="defensive%20back">defensive back</a> in the <a href="American%20Football%20League">American Football League</a> and the <a href="National%20Football%20League">National Football League</a>.
Football career.
He played five seasons for the AFL's <a href="History%20of%20the%20Denver%20Broncos">Denver Broncos</a> (1968–1969) and the NFL's <a href="New%20York%20Jets">New York Jets</a> (1970–1972).
